news.title: Goldman Sachs tops profit estimates as equities, asset and wealth management outperform
news.summary: Trading desks across Wall Street have benefited in the last year as Trump's policies have roiled markets for bonds, currencies, commodities and stocks.

news.title: How Saks's acquisition of Neiman Marcus plunged the company into bankruptcy: 'Recipe for disaster'
news.summary: Saks used $2.2 billion in junk bonds to buy Neiman Marcus. The company didn't have enough money left over to pay vendors.

news.title: Morgan Stanley earnings top estimates driven by wealth management
news.summary: The wealth management unit posted $8.4 billion in net revenue in the most recent quarter. That's up from $7.5 billion a year earlier.

news.title: NATO nations deploy to Greenland after tense White House talks
news.summary: The exercise comes shortly after tense talks between officials representing the U.S., Denmark and Greenland. The joint NATO exercise comes as the United States and Denmark are taking part in a joint military exercise.

news.title: TSMC delivers another record quarter as profit jumps 35% fueled by robust AI chip demand
news.summary: TSMCy delivered another estimate-beating quarter, with profit up 35% from a year ago. advanced chip orders tied to AI continued to dominate its business.

news.title: The ‘risky trinity’ is the most underappreciated market threat right now. These are the stock moves to make.
news.summary: The Leuthold Group says investors should worry about converging themes of AI, bitcoin and private credit. They are taking shelter in these sectors.

news.title: Goldman Sachs’ revenue fell for first time in 2 years — Apple Card was the problem
news.summary: Goldman Sachs beat fourth-quarter profit expectations by a wide margin. But the stock fell as revenue disappointed. The investment banking and equities businesses saw particular strength.

news.title: Boston Scientific is buying Penumbra for $14.5 billion, gaining entry to ‘fast-growing’ vascular segments
news.summary: Penumbra’s stock was up about 14% after the deal was announced Thursday morning. Penumbra will be based in San Francisco, California. The deal is expected to close in the next few weeks.

news.title: Airline miles and hotel points threatened as Trump takes aim at credit-card rules
news.summary: Some experts doubt the measure will actually become reality. They thought it would disproportionately curb rewards for lower-income spenders if enacted. While high-flyers would be able to keep cashing in on rewards.

news.title: Here’s how much money you need to make to afford a $400,000 home
news.summary: Homeownership is a key pillar of the American Dream. But how much does one need to earn in terms of an income or salary to afford it?
